sections.heading: Appeals8-145.AppealsAn order denying, reducing or terminating a subsidy shall be appealable pursuant to title 41, chapter 6, article 6 and chapter 14, article 3
sections.text: Appeals8-145.AppealsAn order denying, reducing or terminating a subsidy shall be appealable pursuant to title 41, chapter 6, article 6 and chapter 14, article 3.
